IAbilityConnection¶

Overview¶

Related Modules:

AbilityKit

Description:

Provides callbacks to be invoked when a remote Service ability is connected or disconnected.

Summary¶

Data Fields¶

Variable Name

Description

OnAbilityConnectDone )(ElementName elementName, SvcIdentityserviceSid, int resultCode, void *data)

void(*

Called when a client is connected to a Service ability.

OnAbilityDisconnectDone )(ElementName elementName, int resultCode, voiddata)

void(*

Called after all connections to a Service ability are disconnected.
